name: Bloody Attraction - Demo 3
description:
Bloody Attraction

The year is 2143. The world has changed beyond a speed it could ever hope to keep up with. Greed, power, lust, and violence is what runs this once united world

You serve as one of its executioners, the gods reaper, the number 1 bounty hunter in all of Elysium, Maverick.

Armed with:

  • Blood-Fueled Katana, The Crimson Maiden
  • Gravity Manipulating Suit, The GS-96

Go through target after target, in hopes of wiping out those who seek to control it all, and find out what it means to be truly human, or that of a mindless machine.
